page.title: 15FURZE FARM MUNDON
page.content: Hiding behind the{Mundon Furze},the large wood,is{Furze Farm}and its large poultry sheds. First the day old chicks arrive , {12,000}at a time,in brown plastic crates. For{seven weeks}they are fed on a {conveyor belt system}. They have automatic drinking fountains. The meal is delivered by{bulk food {lorries}.The food is{blown}into tanks at the end of each shed .The lorry has a{computer}which allows the driver to put exact amount of food needed in each tank . After seven weeks the lights are turned off,the chickens thinking it is night,settle down ,are easily caught and sent by lorry to the{Buxted Frozen {Chicken factory,in Boreham,}for processing.
